business.headline: From Rajdhani to Vande Bharat: Investor criticises India's lag in train techWhen Rajdhani was launched in 1969, it placed India among Asia's fastest rail nations, second only to Japan.

RBI Governor says US tariff impact on growth bigger worry than inflationThe RBI's rate cut comes at a time when inflation appears to be under control, but economic growth faces risks from global uncertainty after US tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.

RBI rate cut brings relief for borrowers, but banking stocks tumble. Here's whyBanking stocks, especially public sector lenders, took a sharp hit after the rate cut announcement. The Nifty Bank index was down nearly 1%, with major losers including Bank of Baroda, Canara Bank, Punjab National Bank, and SBI.

RBI monetary policy: 6 key takeaways from MPC meetingWith the repo rate cut, borrowing costs for home and personal loans are likely to fall. This would provide a big relief to the homebuyers and could boost the housing market.

RBI MPC meeting: 5 key development reforms you must knowCurrently, UPI payments are mostly capped at Rs 1 lakh for both P2P and P2M. The RBI has suggested that National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) may now review and revise these limits based on evolving user needs.

RBI cuts Repo Rate by 25 points to 6% amid global trade warThe Reserve Bank of India has cut the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6%, potentially leading to lower EMIs for home loans. The RBI has also lowered the GDP forecast for FY26 to 6.5% from the earlier 6.7%. The Monetary Policy Committee unanimously decided to change the stance from neutral to accommodative, hinting at possible further easing. The RBI Governor expressed concerns over global trade uncertainties and their potential impact on inflation and growth.

Cheaper home, auto loan EMIs after RBI rate cut. What it means for youRBI reduces key lending rate to 6%. Lower interest rates are expected to make borrowing cheaper, which can help people buy homes or vehicles more easily.

RBI changes stance from neutral to accommodative: What does it mean?The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Sanjay Malhotra has announced a cut in the repo rate by 25 basis points, bringing it down from 6.25% to 6%.

RBI downgrades 2025-26 GDP forecast to 6.5% from 6.7% amid global tariff warWhile sharing the new projections, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said the downward revision of the GDP forecast was mainly due to growing risks in global trade and policy developments.

Donald Trump's 26% reciprocal tariffs on India come into effectA 26% tariff on Indian exports to the USA has come into effect. Key sectors impacted include electronics, gems and jewellery, auto components, and agricultural products. The Union Cabinet is set to meet to discuss India's strategy and the impact on exporters. The Indian government is in touch with exporters to minimise the impact, while also working on a bilateral trade agreement with the US.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6%RBI MPC meeting: This is the second rate cut in a row, following a 25 basis point reduction in February. RBI also changed its earlier stance from neutral to 'accommodative'.

Trump's 26% tariffs on India come into effect, big Cabinet meet todayWith markets in a free fall since Donald Trump's reciprocal tariff announcement, the Union Cabinet will hold a crucial meeting today to strategise on ways to minimise the impact.

entertainment.headline: Kangana Ranaut shocked by electricity bill of Rs 1 lakh for Manali homeActor-MP Kangana Ranaut recently expressed her shock upon receiving the electricity bill of Rs 1 lakh for her Manali residence.

Sikandar box office: Salman Khan's film earns the lowest on 2nd TuesdaySuperstar Salman Khan's film Sikandar is witnessing a sharp decline at the box office. On Day 10, the AR Murugadoss directorial recorded its lowest earnings since release.

Rishabh Sharma's Kal Ho Naa Ho's 'soulful' sitar rendition wins internetRishab Rikhiram Sharma's sitar rendition of Kal Ho Naa Ho captivated audiences in New Delhi, leaving many in awe of his soulful performance. The concert, part of his Sitar for Mental Health India tour, drew praise and admiration from fans both present and online.

Ajay Devgn, Vaani Kapoor react to replacing Ileana D'Cruz in Raid 2Actors Ajay Devgn and Vaani Kapoor recently reacted to questions about replacing Ileana D'Cruz in Raid 2. Ileana was the female lead of Raid.

Soha Ali Khan disappointed about BCCI retiring Pataudi CupThe Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) and the England and Wales Cricket Board's (ECB) decision to retire the Pataudi Trophy has sparked disappointment among the Pataudi family, as the trophy honours the legacy of Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi, a pioneer in Indian cricket. Soha Ali Khan said in an interview that her father should be remembered in some form.

Jr NTR saddened as Pawan Kalyan's son gets injured in Singapore school fireJr NTR expressed his sorrow after Pawan Kalyan's youngest son, Mark Shankar, sustained injuries in a fire accident at his school in Singapore. Taking to X, he shared a note wishing him a speedy recovery.

Robert Pattinson in talks for Denis Villeneuve's star-studded Dune 3 cast: ReportDenis Villeneuve is considering Robert Pattinson for a role in the upcoming Dune: Messiah film. The potential casting adds to the star-studded lineup including Timothee Chalamet and Zendaya.

Director Pa Ranjith faces Internet's wrath for working with MeToo-accused actorDirector Pa Ranjith was questioned by internet users for working with MeToo-accused actor John Vijay. Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi President Thol Thirumavalavan shared a photo with Ranjith and his team after meeting them at Tiruchi airport.

Bazooka pre-release teaser: Mammootty packs a punch in Deeno Dennis's thrillerAhead of the highly anticipated release of Bazooka, the makers have unveiled a pre-release teaser, further adding to the growing buzz. The thriller stars superstar Mammootty, Gautham Vasudev Menon, and others.

Akshay Kumar stuns as Kathakali dancer in new look from Kesari 2Akshay Kumar shared a picture of himself dressed as a Kathakali dancer ahead of the release of Kesari 2. In the film he will be portraying the role of C Sankaran Nair, a lawyer and statesman.

Kajol opens up about daughter Nysa's Bollywood plansBuzz about Ajay Devgn and Kajol's daughter Nysa making her Bollywood debut has been circulating online. However, Kajol recently put an end to the rumours by addressing them at a public event.

L2 Empuraan box office: Mohanlal, Prithviraj's film slows down on Day 13L2: Empuraan Box Office Day 13: The Prithviraj Sukumaran and Mohanlal-starrer has entered the Rs 100 crore nett club in India. However, the action film saw a dip in its day-wise earnings on its second Tuesday.

Tamannaah dodges personal question about 'Vijay' amid breakup rumoursAt the Odela 2 trailer launch, Tamannaah Bhatia engaged in a playful banter with a reporter. Her witty reply to a cheeky question about her personal life drew laughter from the audience.

Chiranjeevi heads to Singapore with Pawan Kalyan after his son's fire injuryMegastar Chiranjeevi and his wife Surekha jetted off to Singapore with Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan on Tuesday. Pawan Kalyan's son, Mark Shankar, was injured in a school fire in Singapore.

Good Bad Ugly director admits his life changed after meeting 'rare gem' Ajith KumarGood Bad Ugly director Adhik Ravichandran opened up about his life after meeting Ajith Kumar. In a candid interview, he shared how the actor turned the spotlight on him.

Smriti Irani to make comeback in Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi? Ektaa Kapoor hintsDid filmmaker Ektaa Kapoor just confirm Smriti Irani's return to Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi reboot? Seems like the actor-turned-politician will make her much-awaited TV comeback after 15 years.

Allu Arjun-Atlee's poster copied from Dune? Internet points out similaritiesAllu Arjun and director Atlee's project was announced on Tuesday, on the occasion of the actor's birthday. However, the internet has pointed out that one of the posters of the film was allegedly copied from 'Dune'.

Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas kiss at his Broadway debut. Don't miss Malti's giftPriyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas shared a passionate kiss at his Broadway debut, 'The Last Five Years'. Their daughter, Malti, gifted a handmade poster for her father.
Producer Salim Akhtar, who launched Rani Mukerji, diesProducer Salim Akhtar died on April 8. He is survived by his wife, Shama Akhtar, and their son, Samad Akhtar.

general news.headline: Tahawwur Rana, David Headley spoke 231 times during recces before 26/11: NIAPakistani-American terrorist David Coleman Headley was in touch with 2008 Mumbai terror attacks mastermind Tahawwur Hussain Rana and called him more than 32 times when he first visited India to conduct recces on September 14, 2006, anti-terror agency NIA told India Today TV.

India clears Rs 63,000-crore deal to buy 26 Rafale Navy jets from France: SourcesWith the Rs 63,000-crore Rafale Marine deal cleared, India moves to phase out MiG-29Ks by 2031, positioning INS Vikrant and INS Vikramaditya for advanced carrier-based combat operations.

RBI Governor says US tariff impact on growth bigger worry than inflationThe RBI's rate cut comes at a time when inflation appears to be under control, but economic growth faces risks from global uncertainty after US tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.

Supposed to eat dhoklas? Mahua Moitra ups ante against BJP in Delhi fish shop rowThe row began on Tuesday when Mahua Moitra posted a video purportedly showing BJP goons confronting fish market vendors in CR Park, claiming that their shops were located too close to a temple.

Mobs plunder KFC, Bata outlets in Bangladesh. Why Dhaka is on boil againBangladesh protests: Outlets of international brands such as Bata, KFC, Pizza Hut, and Puma were vandalised and looted in Bangladesh as thousands took to the streets to protest against Israel.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6%RBI MPC meeting: This is the second rate cut in a row, following a 25 basis point reduction in February. RBI also changed its earlier stance from neutral to 'accommodative'.

Trump says countries kissing my a**, mocks world leaders negotiating US tariffsDonald Trump's remarks come as US tariffs officially kicked in, prompting swift international responses and intensifying debate over his unilateral approach.

Mallikarjun Kharge sidelined? BJP questions Congress over 'separate' chairPointing to the Congress's seating arrangement in the video - where Rahul Gandhi and Sonia Gandhi are seated in the middle on a sofa - Amit Malviya, in-charge of the BJP's national IT department, questioned why the party president and an elderly person like Kharge was not given the central seat.

Namita Thapar reacts to Hotmail co-founder's 'Indian engineers giving gyaan' remarkSabeer Bhatia said earlier this week that "99% of Indians who graduate as engineers join management and start giving gyaan to everybody."

This is how city-killer asteroid that could collide with the Moon looksAstronomers have now constructed a 3D model of asteroid 2024 YR4 using observations conducted by the Gemini South telescope in Chile.

Suchana Seth, Bengaluru tech CEO arrested for son's murder, assaults cop in prisonSuchana Seth, accused of killing her son, was booked for assaulting a woman constable inside Goa's Colvale jail. She allegedly abused and attacked the constable after forcefully taking a prison register.

RBI rate cut brings relief for borrowers, but banking stocks tumble. Here's whyBanking stocks, especially public sector lenders, took a sharp hit after the rate cut announcement. The Nifty Bank index was down nearly 1%, with major losers including Bank of Baroda, Canara Bank, Punjab National Bank, and SBI.

Virat Kohli: I never tried to overshadow anyoneRoyal Challengers Bengaluru talisman Virat Kohli has said that he has never tried to overshadow anyone in the cricketing ecosystem. Kohli has been in strong form in IPL 2025 so far.

Kangana Ranaut refutes claim of her absence from Mandi: I'm not Mr IndiaAddressing people in the Balh assembly segment of Mandi, Kangana Ranaut said Vikramaditya Singh is still in shock after his defeat in the Lok Sabha elections and is therefore making such remarks.

14-year-old's AI app detects heart disease in 7 seconds, praised by Obama, BidenIndian-origin teen Siddharth Nandyala has developed Circadian AI, a hospital-use app that helps detect heart problems in seconds, earning praise from the likes of US Presidents Barrack Obama and Joe Biden.

Even if you kill me...: Mamata Banerjee's unity pitch amid violence over Waqf lawMamata Banerjee asked the minorities to keep faith in her government while asserting that she wouldn't allow divide and rule in Bengal.

Allu Arjun-Atlee's poster copied from Dune? Internet points out similaritiesAllu Arjun and director Atlee's project was announced on Tuesday, on the occasion of the actor's birthday. However, the internet has pointed out that one of the posters of the film was allegedly copied from 'Dune'.

Assam Chief Minister's post on Emirates passenger sparks juice-jacking concernsAssam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma shared a post on X detailing how a person he met on an Emirates flight lent him an international charger and cable he could not return.

Video: Chaos in J&K Assembly as AAP MLA thrashed by BJP leaders over Hindu remarkThe tensions flared after the BJP accused Mehraj Malik of making derogatory remarks against Hindus during media interactions. BJP MLA Vikram Randhawa lashed out at Malik, demanding strict action against him and even invoking the Public Safety Act (PSA).

Putin invites PM Modi to attend 80th Victory Day Parade on May 9The announcement was made by Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Andrey Rudenko, who confirmed that an official invitation has been sent to New Delhi and that preparations for the high-level visit are currently underway.

Akshay Kumar stuns as Kathakali dancer in new look from Kesari 2Akshay Kumar shared a picture of himself dressed as a Kathakali dancer ahead of the release of Kesari 2. In the film he will be portraying the role of C Sankaran Nair, a lawyer and statesman.

26/11 plotter Tahawwur Rana extradited from US, now on flight to India: SourcesUpon arrival in India, Tahawwur Rana will be held in the custody of the National Investigation Agency (NIA) for the initial weeks of interrogation and investigation.

How the human body copes with sizzling temperaturesThe human body relies on an internal thermostat, primarily governed by the hypothalamus, to maintain a stable temperature around 37 degrees Celsius. But this balance is challenged in hot and humid weather.

Trump's 26% tariffs on India come into effect, big Cabinet meet todayWith markets in a free fall since Donald Trump's reciprocal tariff announcement, the Union Cabinet will hold a crucial meeting today to strategise on ways to minimise the impact.

sports.headline: How Premier League can have 7 teams in Champions League from 2025-2026Premier League teams are set to benefit from UEFA's new format, with five clubs earning direct Champions League qualification from next season. Thanks to strong European performances, up to seven English clubs could play in the 2025–26 Champions League.

GT vs RR Live: Samson's Rajasthan face momentum test against GujaratGujarat Titans (GT) vs Rajasthan Royals (RR) Live Score IPL 2025: As we walk into the more intense stages of the Indian Premier League, teams are shifting to aggressive gears in the early stages of this race for playoffs. In terms of fresh action, the in-form Gujarat Titans face off against the recovering Rajasthan Royals at Ahmedabad.

Giving new ball to Jofra Archer has made a big difference for us: Shane BondRajasthan Royals assistant and fast bowling coach Shane Bond acknowledged Jofra Archer's impact with the new ball and said that the fast bowler has made a big difference with the ball for them.

Chahal bowling just 1 over? Fans slam puzzling move from Shreyas IyerYuzvendra Chahal, one of the most expensive players in this year's IPL bowled just 1 over in Punjab Kings' win against CSK. Fans slammed Punjab captain Shreyas Iyer for his puzzling call on Tuesday.

GT vs RR Match Preview: Can recovering Rajasthan handle in-form Gujarat?IPL 2025, GT vs RR Match Preview: Gujarat Titans aim to extend their winning run as they host Rajasthan Royals in Ahmedabad. With no injury concerns for either side and varying pitch conditions in play, the showdown promises a thrilling contest under the scorching April sun.

Aiden Markram reveals Digvesh Rathi's biggest weapon for successLucknow Super Giants batter Aiden Markram revealed Digvesh Rathi's biggest weapon for success in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). Rathi is the second-highest wicket-taker of the season so far for his team with seven wickets to his name.

MS Dhoni is not the problem: Robin Uthappa on CSK's dwindling formChennai Super Kings lost their fourth straight match in IPL 2025 on Tuesday, April 8. MS Dhoni came up to bat at No.5, but was not able to take his team over the line vs Punjab Kings.

Real Madrid coach Ancelotti hopeful of Bernabeu comeback vs ArsenalAfter a heavy first-leg defeat to Arsenal, Carlo Ancelotti believes Real Madrid can still mount a comeback at the Bernabéu, banking on their historic resilience in Europe ahead of the decisive second leg on April 17.

PBKS vs CSK: BCCI punishes Glenn Maxwell for breaching IPL code of conductPunjab Kings all-rounder Glenn Maxwell was fined and handed a demerit point after breaching the IPL Code of Conduct during his side's win over CSK, becoming the sixth player this season to be penalised by the BCC.

Priyansh Arya is a bright prospect for India: Shashank praises PBKS youngsterPunjab Kings batter Shashank Singh praised Priyansh Arya after the young opener hit the fastest hundred by an uncapped player and the fifth-fastest hundred in IPL history.

Priyansh Arya is a bright prospect for India: Shashank praises PBKS youngsterPunjab Kings batter Shashank Singh praised Priyansh Arya after the young opener hit the fastest hundred by an uncapped player and the fifth-fastest hundred in IPL history.

CSK coach Fleming highlights positives after PBKS loss: We batted a bit betterChennai Super Kings coach Stephen Fleming highlighted his side's improved batting performance in Tuesday's narrow loss against Punjab Kings. However, the CSK coach slammed the team's poor fielding and bowling after their fourth consecutive IPL 2025 loss.

Shashank Singh credits Brian Lara for confidence booster after 52 vs CSKIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Shashank Singh scored 52 runs off 36 balls as the Punjab Kings recorded their third win of the tournament after beating Chennai Super Kings by 18 runs on Tuesday in Mullanpur.

CSK lost on the field, top-order failures: coach Fleming after PBKS lossChennai Super Kings head coach Stephen Fleming blamed poor fielding and inconsistent top-order batting for the team's recent struggles, following their fourth consecutive defeat in IPL 2025 against a dominant Punjab Kings.

How timid Priyansh Arya turned fearless to stun CSKIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Priyansh Arya bagged a golden duck against the Rajasthan Royals, but he made an incredible comeback to score a 39-ball hundred against five-time champions Chennai Super Kings on Tuesday in Mullanpur.

Story of CSK in IPL 2025: Jaffer's 'net-run rate' jibe at after PBKS lossWasim Jaffer poked fun at Chennai Super Kings with a cheeky meme, highlighting how the team seems more focused on saving their net run rate than winning matches during what has been a tough IPL season so far.

Didn't understand CSK's decision to retire Devon Conway: Michael ClarkeFormer Australia cricketer Michael Clarke slammed Chennai Super Kings (CSK) management's decision to retire out Devon Conway against Punjab Kings in Match 22 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Markram gives insights into plan to counter Varun Chakravarthy and Sunil NarineLucknow Super Giants (LSG) batter Aiden Markram gave insights into their plan to counter Sunil Narine and Varun Chakravarthy's threat in the game against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR). Markram scored 47 (28) and added 99 runs for the first wicket with Mitchell Marsh as LSG beat KKR by four runs.

Samson's captaincy comeback had calming influence on squad: Shane BondRajasthan Royals (RR) assistant and fast bowling coach Shane Bond feels Sanju Samson's comeback as captain has had a calming influence on the entire team. Samson finally returned as captain and wicketkeeper for Rajasthan in the previous game after playing first three matches as an Impact Substitute due to injury.

Washington Sundar in awe of GT bowlers: Restricting teams to below 180 is amazingIPL 2025, GT vs RR: In the press conference before the match against Rajasthan Royals, Washington Sundar heaped praise on the Gujarat Titans' bowlers for their wholehearted efforts.

How Shreyas Iyer chat helped Priyansh Arya score 39-ball hundred vs CSKPriyansh Arya revealed the chat he had with Shreyas Iyer which helped him to score his maiden IPL hundred against CSK on Tuesday, April 8. Priyansh's knock helped PBKS secure a big win at home against Chennai.

MS Dhoni fan bursts into tears as CSK loses fourth on the trot vs Punjab KingsA MS Dhoni fan was seen crying in the stands after Chennai Super Kings (CSK) lost their fourth consecutive match in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) against Punjab Kings in Chandigarh.

Neeraj Chopra to begin season with Doha Diamond League on May 16Neeraj Chopra is all set to take part in the Doha Diamond League, which is set to take place on May 16. Chopra triumphed at the Qatar Sports Club in 2023, setting a world-leading throw of 88.67m.

After Tilak Varma, Devon Conway retires out in tense run-chaseIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Devon Conway retired out on 69 runs, but the Chennai Super Kings slumped to an 18-run defeat to the Punjab Kings at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in Mullanpur.

Priyansh-powered PBKS hand 4th straight loss to CSK despite Dhoni cameoIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Priyansh Arya was the star of the show as Punjab Kings defeated Chennai Super Kings and handed them a fourth loss on the trot on Tuesday, April 8. MS Dhoni's cameo wasn't enough in the end as Punjab got their first win at home.

Sundar annoyed with question in GT vs RR presser: When did I say that?IPL 2025: Washington Sundar was visibly not happy with a question from a journalist in the press conference before Gujarat Titans' match against Rajasthan Royals on Wednesday in Ahmedabad.

Rishabh Pant explains decision to not bat, says right-left call worked for LSGIPL 2025, LSG vs KKR: Rishabh Pant did not bat during the entire 20 overs, choosing instead to hold himself back. LSG posted 238 on the board and successfully defended it for 2 points in Kolkata.

Our curator has enough publicity: KKR captain Rahane dodges pitch questionKKR captain Ajinkya Rahane dodged questions about the pitch in Kolkata after their 4-run loss to LSG on Tuesday, April 8. The Eden Gardens curator came under the spotlight after his comments early in the season.

In stats: Priyansh Arya becomes 8th uncapped player to hit IPL hundredIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Priyansh Arya broke a series of records after hitting a 39-ball hundred against Chennai Super Kings in Mullanpur. The 24-year-old, who had hit six sixes in Delhi T20 league last year, became the 8th uncapped player to hit a century in the IPL.

Who is Priyansh Arya? 24-year-old PBKS batter hits record IPL hundredIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Priyansh Arya was at his very best when he scored a 39-ball hundred for the Punjab Kings in their match against the Chennai Super Kings on Tuesday in Mullanpur.

Priyansh Arya hits 39-ball hundred, gets standing ovation from Preity ZintaPriyansh Arya produced a special knock and got a standing ovation from Punjab Kings owner Preity Zinta in Mullanpur. Priyansh put the Chennai Super Kings bowlers to the sword on Tuesday, April 8.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
